FALLOUT 1 REBIRTH
=====================================

macOS Installation Instructions
-------------------------------

1. REQUIRED FILES
   You need the original Fallout 1 data files from GOG or Steam:
   - master.dat
   - critter.dat
   - data/ folder

2. INSTALLATION
   Copy ALL of these files to the SAME folder:
   - Fallout 1 Rebirth.app (this app)
   - master.dat
   - critter.dat
   - data/ (entire folder)
   - fallout.cfg (included)
   - f1_res.ini (included)

3. FIRST LAUNCH
   If you see "App is damaged" or cannot open:
   - Open Terminal
   - Run: xattr -cr "Fallout 1 Rebirth.app"
   - Try launching again

   Or: System Preferences > Security > "Open Anyway"

4. CONTROLS
   Left-click: Move / Interact / Select
   Right-click: Change cursor mode
   ESC: Open menu
   I: Inventory
   C: Character
   P: PipBoy

5. CONFIGURATION
   Edit f1_res.ini to change resolution:
   - SCR_WIDTH: Screen width in pixels
   - SCR_HEIGHT: Screen height in pixels
   - WINDOWED: 1 for windowed, 0 for fullscreen

6. INCLUDED ENHANCEMENTS
   - iPad/Mac input improvements (evaera)
   - Touch control optimization (zverinapavel)
   - Borderless window mode (radozd)
   - QoL features (korri123)
   - TeamX Patch 1.3.5
   - NPC Mod 3.5
   - Restoration Mod 1.0b1
   - Dialog and Animation fixes
